article: It's Thursday today. I'm not very free. At 8 o'clock we _ Maths. Our Maths teacher gives us a lot of _ to do. I don't like Maths because it's _ Then we have English _ 9:00. The teacher asks us to recite  the new words. But I can't! Next, we have Chinese at 10:00. I like it _ it's interesting. So I listen to the teacher carefully in class. At11:00 we have History. It's really _ because we can talk _ something in class. History is my favourite _ We don't have PE today. I don't like to be in the classroom all day.
